Class PicturePopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  jpo.PicturePopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, CopyLocationsChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.MenuElement, RecentDropNodeListener, java.io.Serializable, UserFunctionsChangeListener
public class PicturePopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, RecentDropNodeListener, CopyLocationsChangeListener, UserFunctionsChangeListener

This class generates a popup menu over a picture node.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PicturePopupMenu

public PicturePopupMenu(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode node)
Constructs a popupmenu for the indicated picture node.

Parameters:
node - The node that the popup was invoked upon
Method Detail

recentDropNodesChanged

public void recentDropNodesChanged()
Here we receive notification that the nodes have been updated. The method then updates the menu items for the drop targets. Those that are null are not shown. If no drop targets are shown at all the seerator in the submenu is not shown either.

Specified by:
recentDropNodesChanged in interface RecentDropNodeListener

copyLocationsChanged

public void copyLocationsChanged()
Here we receive notification that the copy locations were updated and then go and update the targets on the menu.

Specified by:
copyLocationsChanged in interface CopyLocationsChangeListener

userFunctionsChanged

public void userFunctionsChanged()
Here we receive notification that the user Functions were updated and then go and update the menu.

Specified by:
userFunctionsChanged in interface UserFunctionsChangeListener

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
The PicturePopupMenu routes menu click events for the recent drop node, copy locations and user Functions here for processing. These are all array based lists.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
